segments.text: I can ’ t attend the meeting in Washington . I ’ Ve proposed you as the most able substitute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I ’ Ve never been on a business trip before !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s easy enough . Just make sure you keep track of all your expenses . The accounting department will reimburse you for all your meals and travel expenses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So the company will pay for everything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but when you send in your expense report , you also have to file a report summarizing your trip . It ’ s not just a big vacation , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . But what do you want me to do there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve already paved the way . You just have to give a presentation on what our products are . I will do the follow-up and close the sale .
segments.speaker: S1
